title: Payment Methods
text: We accept VISA, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, and Binance. For international customers, we recommend using PayPal for a smoother transaction.

title: Cancellation Policy
text: Cancellations made at least 7 days before check-in are eligible for a full refund. For cancellations within 7 days of check-in, a 50% fee will apply. No refunds are available for cancellations within 24 hours of check-in.

title: Check-In and Check-Out Times
text: Check-in starts at 3:00 PM, and check-out is at 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out is subject to availability and may incur additional charges.

title: Long Stays
text: Discounts are available for stays longer than 14 nights. Please contact us directly for personalized offers.

title: Travel Insurance
text: We strongly recommend purchasing travel insurance to cover unexpected events such as trip cancellations, medical emergencies, or lost belongings.

title: Pet Policy
text: Pets are welcome in designated pet-friendly rooms for an additional fee. Please inform us in advance if you are bringing a pet.

title: Transportation Services
text: We offer airport shuttle services upon request. Please book at least 48 hours in advance to guarantee availability.

title: Wi-Fi Availability
text: Free high-speed Wi-Fi is available throughout the property, including guest rooms and common areas.

title: Smoking Policy
text: Our property is 100% smoke-free. Designated smoking areas are available outside the building.

title: Local Attractions
text: Our location is close to popular landmarks such as the City Museum, Sunset Beach, and Adventure Park. Visit our reception for a map and personalized recommendations.
